fields.name: AddOnFeatures
fields.description: The list of add-on features to enable in the cluster.

fields.name: ApplicationTypeVersionsCleanupPolicy
fields.description: The policy used to clean up unused versions.

fields.name: AvailableClusterVersions
fields.description: The Service Fabric runtime versions available for this cluster.

fields.name: AzureActiveDirectory
fields.description: The AAD authentication settings of the cluster.

fields.name: Certificate
fields.description: The certificate to use for securing the cluster. The certificate provided will be used for node to node security within the cluster, SSL certificate for cluster management endpoint and default admin client.

fields.name: ClientCertificateCommonNames
fields.description: The list of client certificates referenced by common name that are allowed to manage the cluster.

fields.name: ClientCertificateThumbprints
fields.description: The list of client certificates referenced by thumbprint that are allowed to manage the cluster.

fields.name: ClusterCodeVersion
fields.description: The Service Fabric runtime version of the cluster. This property can only by set the user when **upgradeMode** is set to 'Manual'. To get list of available Service Fabric versions for new clusters use [ClusterVersion API](https://learn.microsoft.com/rest/api/servicefabric/cluster-versions/list). To get the list of available version for existing clusters use **availableClusterVersions**.

fields.name: ClusterEndpoint
fields.description: The Azure Resource Provider endpoint. A system service in the cluster connects to this  endpoint.

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.description: A service generated unique identifier for the cluster resource.

fields.name: DiagnosticsStorageAccountConfig
fields.description: The storage account information for storing Service Fabric diagnostic logs.

fields.name: EventStoreServiceEnabled
fields.description: Indicates if the event store service is enabled.

fields.name: FabricSettings
fields.description: The list of custom fabric settings to configure the cluster.

fields.name: InfrastructureServiceManager
fields.description: Indicates if infrastructure service manager is enabled.

fields.name: ManagementEndpoint
fields.description: The http management endpoint of the cluster.

fields.name: NodeTypes
fields.description: The list of node types in the cluster.

fields.name: Notifications
fields.description: Indicates a list of notification channels for cluster events.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the cluster resource.

fields.name: ReverseProxyCertificate
fields.description: The server certificate used by reverse proxy.

fields.name: UpgradeDescription
fields.description: The policy to use when upgrading the cluster.

fields.name: UpgradePauseEndTimestampUtc
fields.description: Indicates the end date and time to pause automatic runtime version upgrades on the cluster for an specific period of time on the cluster (UTC).

fields.name: UpgradePauseStartTimestampUtc
fields.description: Indicates the start date and time to pause automatic runtime version upgrades on the cluster for an specific period of time on the cluster (UTC).

fields.name: UpgradeWave
fields.description: Indicates when new cluster runtime version upgrades will be applied after they are released. By default is Wave0. Only applies when **upgradeMode** is set to 'Automatic'.

fields.name: VmImage
fields.description: The VM image VMSS has been configured with. Generic names such as Windows or Linux can be used.

fields.name: WaveUpgradePaused
fields.description: Boolean to pause automatic runtime version upgrades to the cluster.
